channel.title: Random theiving

item.title: Random theiving
item.dc:creator: @GoldenScape GoldenScape
item.description:
@GoldenScape wrote:

Hello Moparscape,I made my own Theiving Chest.Only problem is-You get all of the items at once,I want to make it random at different times you get 1 item per,and it changes.Please help-Hereâ€™s a Picture to show what it does:

This is my Case for the Theiving Chest:

case 375: //Theiving Chest if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 20; sendMessage("You steal from the chest"); addItem(995, 50000); addItem(5698, 1); addItem(861, 1); addItem(995, 50000); addItem(5698, 1); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[17]), 17); } break;
Please Help,All help appreciated.
~Thanks,
Goldenscape.
